original_text: Then the disciple whom Jesus loved said to Peter, “It is the Lord!” As soon as Simon Peter heard him say, “It is the Lord,” he wrapped his outer garment around him (for he had taken it off) and jumped into the water.
korean_text: 예수께서 사랑하시는 그 제자가 베드로에게 이르되 주님이시라 하니 시몬 베드로가 벗고 있다가 주님이라 하는 말을 듣고 겉옷을 두른 후에 바다로 뛰어 내리더라

sentences.original_text: Then the disciple whom Jesus loved said to Peter
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 예수께서 사랑하시던 제자가 베드로에게 말했다

sentences.original_text: As soon as Simon Peter heard him say
he wrapped his outer garment around him
for he had taken it off
